translation.en: We then decided to turn it into a real membership club.
translation.it: Poi è diventato un vero e proprio circolo.

translation.en: [Billy] Looking back to when I moved to New York, I was looking for a community.
translation.it: Quando mi trasferii a New York, cercavo una comunità.

translation.en: I wanted perks and guidance and, really,
translation.it: Volevo dei consigli

translation.en: I wanted to be told what to do, where to go where to find great things in my city.
translation.it: su cosa fare, dove andare, dove trovare delle belle cose in città.

translation.en: So, we created Magnises.
translation.it: Così è nata Magnises.

translation.en: Billy really is one of the world's greatest salesmen.
translation.it: Billy è uno dei migliori venditori del mondo.

translation.en: He can convince anyone of pretty much anything.
translation.it: Riesce a convincere tutti di qualunque cosa.

translation.en: [anchor] Billy, I'm looking forward to the day when I'll be working for you.
translation.it: Billy, spero, un giorno, di lavorare per te.

translation.en: I've known Billy probably since he was 20 years old
translation.it: Conosco Billy da quando aveva circa 20 anni,

translation.en: and Billy is an amazing entrepreneur.
translation.it: ed è un imprenditore eccezionale.

translation.en: This is a young kid who figured out how to get these millennials
translation.it: È un ragazzino che ha capito come prendere questi millennial

translation.en: and lock them in.
translation.it: e non farseli scappare.

translation.en: So we take everybody who has a card and create a lot of networking opportunities.
translation.it: Permettiamo a chiunque abbia una carta di crearsi una rete di contatti.

translation.en: And we're partners with local merchants - fashion stores, restaurants, gyms.
translation.it: Siamo partner con commercianti locali, negozi di moda, ristoranti, palestre.

translation.en: They offer deals and discounts,
translation.it: Fanno offerte e sconti,

translation.en: and the big thing they had was this clubhouse in West Village.
translation.it: e avevano questa sede a West Village,

translation.en: You could take dates and friends there and that's where they had the events.
translation.it: dove potevi andare con i tuoi amici e organizzavano eventi.

translation.en: I helped Billy design wine tasting series and lecture series
translation.it: Ho aiutato Billy a organizzare degustazioni di vini, letture

translation.en: and many different things that brought these kids together
translation.it: e tante altre cose che univano questi ragazzi

translation.en: with a sense of community.
translation.it: in un senso di comunità.

translation.en: The parties were unbelievable. They had live music, booze and food...
translation.it: Le feste erano incredibili. C'era musica live, alcol e cibo...

translation.en: I saw Ja Rule a bunch.
translation.it: Spesso c'era Ja Rule.

translation.en: Ja Rule is taking his talents to a new business.
translation.it: Ja Rule punta ad un nuovo business.

translation.en: The rapper lending his creative mind to an elite credit card for millenials.
translation.it: Il rapper presta la sua mente creativa ad una carta di credito per millennial.

translation.en: What we're doing with Magnises is growing very fast.
translation.it: Ciò che facciamo con Magnises sta crescendo in fretta.

translation.en: [Martin] We built on an app, went digital. We crossed the 10,000-member mark.
translation.it: Abbiamo creato un'app digitale. Abbiamo superato i 10.000 membri.

translation.en: We were taking in close to $2 million in membership fees.
translation.it: Prendevamo quasi due milioni in quote d'iscrizione.

translation.en: As we kept moving with Magnises,
translation.it: Con Magnises che andava avanti,

translation.en: he wanted to penetrate the New York upper class.
translation.it: voleva entrare nell'alta società di New York.

translation.en: He thought that the Maserati and flying to meetings in private jets
translation.it: Pensava che le Maserati e i jet privati

translation.en: were necessary in his pursuit of changing his external image
translation.it: fossero necessari per il suo cambiamento di immagine,

translation.en: and he thought that image would also be a serious driver for the company.
translation.it: perché pensava che anche l'immagine fosse importante per la società.

translation.en: [Andy] I hosted probably 40 events for Magnises
translation.it: Avrò ospitato circa 40 eventi per Magnises,

translation.en: and a lot of the members enjoyed being a part of that community.
translation.it: a molti membri piaceva far parte di quella comunità.

translation.en: That audience, I think, was the audience that Billy was focused on
translation.it: Credo che quello fosse lo stesso tipo di pubblico

translation.en: as far as Fyre was concerned as well...
translation.it: a cui puntava per il Fyre.

translation.en: but it was a vision that was so big...
translation.it: Ma era un'idea così grande

translation.en: that it was not something that was going to be easy to pull off.
translation.it: che non era semplice da realizzare.

translation.en: Could you imagine trying to host a music festival,
translation.it: Sai che significa ospitare un festival musicale,

translation.en: even on Miami Beach or in Boston or LA?
translation.it: anche a Miami Beach, Boston o Los Angeles?

translation.en: Almost impossible without an incredibly big infrastructure.
translation.it: È quasi impossibile se non si hanno delle infrastrutture enormi.

translation.en: So, dial it up to a small island in the Bahamas.
translation.it: Immaginalo su una piccola isola alle Bahamas.

translation.en: It would probably be the most difficult place you could do it.
translation.it: Forse è il posto più complicato in cui poterlo fare.

translation.en: Billy called me and he said, "Listen,
translation.it: Billy mi ha chiamato e mi ha detto:

translation.en: I need your help and I need you to get to the Bahamas as soon as possible."
translation.it: "Mi serve il tuo aiuto, vieni alle Bahamas il prima possibile".

translation.en: And I flew in, not in any role, except sort of subtly
translation.it: Così sono andato, semplicemente in discreta qualità

translation.en: being the new leader and being kind of...
translation.it: di nuovo leader e come una specie di...

translation.en: Billy's whisperer.
translation.it: ...consigliere personale.

translation.en: To do a proper music festival,
translation.it: Per fare un festival come si deve,

translation.en: I would say you should try to start the...
translation.it: bisognerebbe iniziare

translation.en: the design and the fundraising, everything at least 12 months out.
translation.it: con la progettazione e il fundraising almeno 12 mesi prima.

translation.en: The true core team that came in literally had
translation.it: Quando è arrivato il team di base, avevano letteralmente

translation.en: six to eight weeks to build this thing and put it together.
translation.it: dalle sei alle otto settimane per mettere insieme tutto.

translation.en: [interviewer] Were you ever aware that they said they had bought an island?
translation.it: Sapevi che avevano detto di aver comprato l'isola?

translation.en: It's like you couldn't...
translation.it: Non riuscivi...

translation.en: differentiate what was true
translation.it: ...a distinguere ciò che era vero

translation.en: and what wasn't true.
translation.it: da ciò che non lo era.

translation.en: I think we chose the right island.
translation.it: Abbiamo scelto l'isola giusta.

translation.en: We got ours for ten million. Freehold land, no lease. We own the land forever.
translation.it: Ci è costata dieci milioni. Proprietà assoluta, è nostra per sempre.

translation.en: I think it was like, he had to put a million down
translation.it: Credo che dovessero versare un primo milione

translation.en: and then pay the rest by a certain amount of time.
translation.it: e pagare il resto dopo un tot di tempo.

translation.en: I don't know if that million was ever paid.
translation.it: Ma non so se quel milione sia mai stato versato.

translation.en: This was Pablo Escobar's island twenty-five years ago.
translation.it: Questa era l'isola di Pablo Escobar 25 anni fa.

translation.en: So we're taking the dream for your average person in America or wherever they are and saying, "For three days,
translation.it: Quindi regaliamo un sogno a chiunque dicendo: "Per tre giorni,

translation.en: you can become Pablo Escobar."
translation.it: puoi essere Pablo Escobar".

translation.en: [Andy] Billy was dealing with Pablo Escobar's lawyer,
translation.it: Billy aveva a che fare con l'avvocato di Pablo Escobar

translation.en: he was dealing with family members.
translation.it: e con la sua famiglia.

translation.en: [J.R.] Norman's Cay is rich in history
translation.it: Storicamente, la Norman's Cay

translation.en: with cocaine drug lords running their drugs through the Bahamas.
translation.it: era piena di narcotrafficanti che spacciavano cocaina nelle Bahamas.

translation.en: The owner of the Cay, he wanted a new reputation for his Cay.
translation.it: Il proprietario dell'isola voleva cambiarle reputazione.

translation.en: They were told not to use the word "Pablo Escobar"
translation.it: Gli aveva detto di non usare la parola "Pablo Escobar",

translation.en: and then they used that in the first social media tweets.
translation.it: ma loro l'hanno usata sin dai primi tweet.

translation.en: The new owner saw the first video promotion
translation.it: Il nuovo proprietario ha visto il video promo

translation.en: and he kicked us off in one shot.
translation.it: e ci ha cacciati immediatamente.

translation.en: Like, no questions asked.
translation.it: Senza volerne sapere nulla.

translation.en: They were kicked off.
translation.it: Semplicemente cacciati.

translation.en: Six or eight weeks out,
translation.it: Sei o otto settimane prima,

translation.en: he had to find a new location on a neighboring Island...
translation.it: doveva trovare una nuova location su un'isola vicina

translation.en: and then start the whole process all over again.
translation.it: e ricominciare tutto daccapo.

translation.en: We were constantly trying to move, like, trying to find a new location
translation.it: Ci spostavamo di continuo, in cerca di una nuova location

translation.en: and trying to find what fits.
translation.it: che fosse adatta,

translation.en: Man, it just started to get hectic.
translation.it: e la situazione si stava mettendo male.

translation.en: Then I went to another island, until you finally got to Great Exuma,
translation.it: Ci spostavamo di isola in isola, finché non abbiamo trovato la Great Exuma,

translation.en: where it was at least the biggest island in the Exumas
translation.it: che almeno era l'isola più grande dell'arcipelago,

translation.en: so it had, you know...
translation.it: quindi aveva, insomma...

translation.en: plumbing.
translation.it: ...delle tubature.

translation.en: American rapper, singer and actor Ja Rule, also known as Jeffrey Atkins,
translation.it: Il rapper, cantante e attore americano Ja Rule, nome d'arte di Jeffrey Atkins,

translation.en: is in the Bahamas with his business partners
translation.it: è alle Bahamas con il suo socio

translation.en: to discuss the details of a concert next month.
translation.it: per discutere i dettagli del concerto che avrà luogo il mese prossimo.

translation.en: Fyre was like the thing of the island. Renting so much, rent-a-cars,
translation.it: Il Fyre era l'evento dell'isola. Avrebbero affittato case, auto,

translation.en: big jets are flying in.
translation.it: sarebbero atterrati grandi jet.

translation.en: Everybody was saying, "Hey, that's Fyre, they have lots of money.
translation.it: Tutti dicevano: "Ehi, è il Fyre, quelli sono pieni di soldi.

translation.en: They could do anything."
translation.it: Possono fare qualunque cosa".

translation.en: We hope this is the first of many steps
translation.it: Speriamo che sia il primo passo

translation.en: to bring entertainment and bring value back to the Bahamas.
translation.it: per riportare l'intrattenimento e il valore alle Bahamas.

translation.en: I was waiting for some shit like this to happen in the Bahamas, to be real.
translation.it: Sinceramente, speravo in una cosa simile alle Bahamas.

translation.en: You know, we never had that many American artists,
translation.it: Insomma, non avevamo mai avuto tanti artisti americani

translation.en: you know, on one stage.
translation.it: sullo stesso palco.

translation.en: This was supposed to go on for five years, every year.
translation.it: Avrebbe dovuto ripetersi ogni anno per cinque anni.

translation.en: So, if you do good, you were asked for five years.
translation.it: Quindi, se lavoravi bene, ti richiamavano per cinque anni.

translation.en: You got the contract, so you wanted to live up to the expectations.
translation.it: Firmavi un contratto, quindi volevi essere all'altezza delle aspettative.

translation.en: [Mark] They had the site.
translation.it: Avevano la location.

translation.en: They let us onto the property...
translation.it: Ci hanno portati lì...

translation.en: and we looked at it.
translation.it: ...e ci abbiamo dato un'occhiata.

translation.en: And that's when some of the questions started to rise.
translation.it: Lì abbiamo iniziato a farci delle domande.

translation.en: The site...
translation.it: La location...

translation.en: was on a hill...
translation.it: ...era su una collina.

translation.en: and at the base,
translation.it: E, alla base,

translation.en: what I saw was, pretty much, a housing development
translation.it: c'era una specie di cantiere

translation.en: construction site...
translation.it: di un complesso residenziale

translation.en: that was hazardous in many ways and that needed a lot of work.
translation.it: che era rischioso sotto molti aspetti e aveva bisogno di parecchio lavoro.

translation.en: You know there's going to be hiccups, there's gonna be things to be addressed.
translation.it: Sai che possono esserci degli intoppi e cose a cui pensare.

translation.en: It's a first-year festival on an island and you find solutions.
translation.it: È il primo anno di un festival su un'isola, si cercano soluzioni.

translation.en: We said, "Here's what you should think about,
translation.it: Così abbiamo detto: "Possiamo fare così.

translation.en: you know, here's what your tenting is,
translation.it: Qui ci saranno le tende,

translation.en: you know, the geodesic domes...
translation.it: qui le cupole geodetiche.

translation.en: Here's what it's going to cost to set up."
translation.it: Ti verrà a costare tanto".

translation.en: And... away we went.
translation.it: E... siamo partiti.

translation.en: What's crazy is they booked the festival
translation.it: La cosa assurda è che avevano organizzato il festival

translation.en: during the busiest weekend of the year on Great Exuma.
translation.it: nella settimana più piena dell'anno sulla Great Exuma.

translation.en: It's like the Superbowl there.
translation.it: Lì è come il Superbowl.

translation.en: It's called the National Regatta,
translation.it: Si chiama la Regata Nazionale,

translation.en: and the island basically doubles in population size
translation.it: la popolazione si raddoppia sull'isola

translation.en: and all of the hotels get booked months, maybe a year in advance.
translation.it: e tutti gli hotel vengono prenotati mesi, forse un anno prima.

translation.en: Billy had sold a villa package,
translation.it: Billy aveva venduto il pacchetto villa,

translation.en: and these people were essentially staying in an Airbnb,
translation.it: e invece queste persone alloggiavano in Airbnb,

translation.en: so we had to find houses all across the island for 500 guests.
translation.it: quindi dovevamo trovare case disponibili per 500 persone.

translation.en: To make it worse, they had oversold
translation.it: Come se non bastasse, avevano venduto

translation.en: their "Lodge" packages,
translation.it: i pacchetti "Lodge",

translation.en: which were these tents on the main site.
translation.it: che erano le tende nella location principale.

translation.en: And then the word comes down from the top
translation.it: E poi avevano deciso

translation.en: that all influencers will get housing for free.
translation.it: che tutti gli influencer avrebbero avuto alloggi gratuiti.

translation.en: So I start calling influencers.
translation.it: Così li ho chiamati.

translation.en: I was the first voice that they had heard since they posted.
translation.it: Ero la prima persona che sentivano da quando avevano pubblicato i post.

translation.en: Each influencer, and there were about 250 influencers,
translation.it: Ad ogni influencer, ed erano circa 250,

translation.en: were promised, for a post,
translation.it: avevano promesso, in cambio

translation.en: for one post...
translation.it: di un singolo post,

translation.en: a one-bedroom, three-person villa on the beach...
translation.it: una villa per tre persone sulla spiaggia...

translation.en: that didn't exist.
translation.it: ...che non esisteva.

translation.en: I started talking to Billy...
translation.it: Andai a parlare con Billy,

translation.en: and from the get-go, it was, you know,
translation.it: e, sin dall'inizio,

translation.en: we were all running around, scrambling, every day to find new houses.
translation.it: correvamo da una parte all'altra per trovare nuove case.

translation.en: "We need help from you guys, start to cut people.
translation.it: "Ci serve il vostro aiuto, dovete escludere qualcuno.

translation.en: These people aren't paying for the experience.
translation.it: Questa gente non sta pagando per l'evento.

translation.en: Tell them not to come."
translation.it: Dite loro di non venire".

translation.en: And it was a constant battle because what they cared most about
translation.it: Era una battaglia continua, perché loro tenevano di più

translation.en: was the influencers.
translation.it: agli influencer.

translation.en: So I'm imploring them to cancel paying guests at this point.
translation.it: Allora li ho implorati di tagliare fuori gli ospiti paganti.

translation.en: "They're not gonna have a place to stay." And the response from Billy was,
translation.it: Non avrebbero avuto un posto dove stare. E Billy mi rispose:

translation.en: "We're not a problems focus group. We're a solutions-oriented group.
translation.it: "Noi non guardiamo i problemi. Troviamo le soluzioni.

translation.en: We need to have a positive attitude about this. We need a good attitude."
translation.it: Dobbiamo avere un atteggiamento positivo".

translation.en: And he was unflappable but he was also entirely delusional.
translation.it: Era impassibile, ma anche totalmente delirante.

translation.en: So it was this constant battle in my mind between,
translation.it: Quindi tra me e me pensavo:

translation.en: "Is this guy a genius or is he a madman?"
translation.it: "Questo tizio è un genio o è un folle?"

translation.en: Because he just would not take "no" for an answer and he wouldn't take advice.
translation.it: Perché non accettava un no come risposta, ma neanche consigli.

translation.en: [interviewer] Where do you stand now?
translation.it: E ora cosa pensi?

translation.en: He's a liar.
translation.it: Che è un bugiardo.

translation.en: [Calvin] Billy McFarland first got on my radar living here in New York.
translation.it: La prima volta che ho sentito parlare di Billy McFarland vivevo qui a New York.

translation.en: He was running a company called Magnises.
translation.it: Gestiva una società chiamata Magnises.

translation.en: I had a number of friends then that did get the Magnises card
translation.it: Alcuni miei amici avevano comprato la carta Magnises...

translation.en: when they started offering
translation.it: ...quando offrivano

translation.en: access to elite tickets at a cost well below the market rate.
translation.it: biglietti esclusivi a un costo molto inferiore al prezzo di mercato.

translation.en: The whole thing didn't make sense to me.
translation.it: La cosa mi puzzava.

translation.en: People that I've spoken to that were cardholders
translation.it: Alcuni titolari della carta con cui ho parlato

translation.en: recount having their reservations canceled at the last minute,
translation.it: hanno detto che hanno cancellato le loro prenotazioni all'ultimo,

translation.en: so it seemed very hard for people to actually
translation.it: ed era difficile

translation.en: access any of the benefits that they were promised
translation.it: ottenere i benefit promessi.

translation.en: And so, this guy was always out there, just running hustles...
translation.it: Quindi questo tizio se ne stava lì a gestire dei giri...

translation.en: that were sort of slick,
translation.it: ...in qualche modo brillanti,

translation.en: but then not necessarily, in my mind, something that was by the book.
translation.it: ma che non mi sembravano del tutto legali.

translation.en: I vividly remember the Fyre festival video.
translation.it: Ricordo perfettamente il video del Fyre Festival.

translation.en: This video was everywhere on Facebook
translation.it: Girava ovunque su Facebook,

translation.en: and I see a few of the bands that I actually work with
translation.it: e vidi alcuni dei gruppi con cui lavoro

translation.en: listed as headliners for this festival.
translation.it: nella scaletta principale del festival.

translation.en: So I immediately called the agents and I say,
translation.it: Così ho chiamato i loro agenti e ho detto:

translation.en: "Hey, look, this thing doesn't make sense to me,"
translation.it: "Questa cosa non mi convince".

translation.en: and they start saying, "It doesn't make sense to us either.
translation.it: E loro mi hanno risposto: "Non convince neanche noi.

translation.en: These guys are promising to pay two X what our market value is."
translation.it: Hanno promesso di pagarci il doppio del prezzo di mercato".

translation.en: I say, "Have they sent the money?" and they say, "Funny that you ask,
translation.it: Ho chiesto se li avessero già pagati, e mi hanno risposto

translation.en: No, they haven't sent the money for it yet."
translation.it: che non l'avevano ancora fatto.

translation.en: I say, "Okay. This is interesting."
translation.it: Ho pensato: "Ok, interessante".

translation.en: I take a more active role
translation.it: Allora ho iniziato

translation.en: in investigating everything that was going on with Fyre Festival.
translation.it: a indagare più a fondo sul Fyre Festival.

translation.en: What I realized was that they had rented an area north of Sandals Resort
translation.it: Così ho scoperto che avevano noleggiato un'area al nord del Sandals Resort

translation.en: and then effectively photoshopped out the bottom portion of the map
translation.it: e l'avevano photoshoppata tagliando la parte inferiore della mappa

translation.en: to make it look like they were on a deserted island.
translation.it: per farla sembrare un'isola deserta.

translation.en: I thought, "The world's gotta know what's going on."
translation.it: Ho pensato che tutti dovessero saperlo.

translation.en: So I create the now-infamous Twitter account, FyreFraud.
translation.it: Così, ho creato l'ormai tristemente noto account Twitter, FyreFraud.

translation.en: I thought, "Okay, I'm going to put this out there
translation.it: LA GREAT EXUMA NON È UN'ISOLA PRIVATA STATE MENTENDO A TUTTI Ho pensato di renderlo pubblico,

translation.en: and people are going to see this
translation.it: così che la gente

translation.en: and everyone's going to know it's bogus,"
translation.it: vedesse che era fasullo,

translation.en: and nothing happened.
translation.it: ma non è successo nulla.

translation.en: I got maybe two or three clicks on Twitter and that was it.
translation.it: Forse ho avuto due o tre clic su Twitter, nient'altro.

translation.en: So I said, "All right, we gotta hit 'em a little harder."
translation.it: Allora ho pensato: "Ok, colpiamoli un po' più forte".

translation.en: What we ended up doing was taking a plane down there
translation.it: Abbiamo sorvolato la zona

translation.en: and photographing the development and what they were working on.
translation.it: e abbiamo scattato delle foto.

translation.en: One of the things that really struck me
translation.it: Una delle cose che mi ha colpito di più

translation.en: was that they were erecting these dome tents
translation.it: erano le tende a cupola

translation.en: that were pitched as "luxury villas" that I realized
translation.it: che venivano spacciate per "ville di lusso",

translation.en: were leftover hurricane tents from Hurricane Matthew.
translation.it: ma che in realtà erano tende usate per l'uragano Matthew.

translation.en: That is a far stretch from a luxury villa on a deserted island.
translation.it: Erano molto lontane dall'essere delle ville di lusso in un'isola deserta.

translation.en: I realized very quickly that there was no way
translation.it: Ho subito capito che era impossibile

translation.en: that these guys were going to be able to pull this off.
translation.it: che ce l'avrebbero fatta.

translation.en: [Mark] We were building a city within a city
translation.it: Stavamo costruendo una città nella città,

translation.en: in terms of waste disposal,
translation.it: in termini di smaltimento dei rifiuti,

translation.en: in terms of restrooms, water.
translation.it: di bagni, di acqua.

translation.en: It was a fucking shit show,
translation.it: Era un pessimo spettacolo,

translation.en: but we were doing everything that we could possibly do.
translation.it: ma stavamo facendo tutto il possibile.

translation.en: They're frantically building the site.
translation.it: Si affannavano a costruire la location.

translation.en: You know, 100 day laborers working around the clock, no sleep.
translation.it: Cento braccianti che lavoravano 24 ore su 24, senza dormire.

translation.en: It was just this mass, big crew of local workers.
translation.it: Era un enorme gruppo di lavoratori locali.

translation.en: Billy paid them off and then he was like, "You know, we need more guys.
translation.it: Billy li pagava e diceva: "Ce ne servono di più.

translation.en: We need more workers."
translation.it: Ci servono più persone".

translation.en: Billy paid them for the next three days and then...
translation.it: Li pagava per altri tre giorni

translation.en: Billy's like, "Bring more workers. We need more workers."
translation.it: e diceva: "Servono più lavoratori".

translation.en: And then it was starting to get too much for me to handle.
translation.it: Iniziava a essere ingestibile per me.

translation.en: They had every living soul on the island of Exuma
translation.it: Facevano lavorare chiunque potesse alzare un braccio

translation.en: who could lift a towel, working.
translation.it: sull'isola di Exuma.

translation.en: My gosh, there had to have been, probably at some point, 200 people.
translation.it: Oddio, probabilmente, a un certo punto ci saranno state 200 persone.

translation.en: I had to feed all the staff.
translation.it: Io dovevo dare da mangiare a tutti.

translation.en: Basically, that was taking on the whole Fyre operation under my wings.
translation.it: In pratica, avevo l'intera operazione del Fyre sotto la mia ala.

translation.en: I'd gone down to the Bahamas with some friends
translation.it: Ero andato alle Bahamas con degli amici

translation.en: and just coincidentally we actually ran into Ja Rule and Billy down there
translation.it: e lì ci siamo incontrati per caso con Ja Rule e Billy,

translation.en: and then they offered to take us on a little tour of the site.
translation.it: che ci hanno offerto un piccolo tour del posto.

translation.en: It was beautiful, you know, but it's just like a big giant bluff
translation.it: Era bellissimo, ma era solo un enorme promontorio

translation.en: overlooking the ocean. There are no buildings, there's no...
translation.it: che si affacciava sull'oceano. Non c'erano edifici, non c'era...

translation.en: access to electricity or running water or any of that type of stuff.
translation.it: ...elettricità o acqua corrente, niente di tutto ciò.

translation.en: We were just kind of like, concerned, really, there was no infrastructure in place, you know,
translation.it: Noi eravamo preoccupati perché non c'erano infrastrutture,

translation.en: but at the same time, they sounded fairly confident
translation.it: ma, allo stesso tempo, loro sembravano sicuri

translation.en: about their ability to get this thing done.
translation.it: di potercela fare.

translation.en: [Samuel] How is it non-negotiable?
translation.it: In che senso "non è negoziabile"?

translation.en: When you guys are not the headlining act at a bigger festival,
translation.it: Se non siete tra gli artisti principali,

translation.en: you guys don't get top of billing. I mean, in our contract...
translation.it: non potete comparire in alto nella scaletta. Insomma, nel contratto...

translation.en: I understand. I mean, it's a font size.
translation.it: Lo capisco. È la dimensione dei caratteri.

translation.en: You had people working 24 hours a day.
translation.it: C'era gente che lavorava per tutto il giorno.

translation.en: I had to work basically two days in one because of Fyre Media
translation.it: Io dovevo praticamente lavorare il doppio per Fyre Media

translation.en: and then Fyre Festival.
translation.it: e per il Fyre Festival.

translation.en: I noticed the people that were involved in going back and forth to the Bahamas,
translation.it: Le persone che andavano avanti e indietro dalle Bahamas

translation.en: in the planning, they were becoming growingly frustrated.
translation.it: nella progettazione, erano sempre più frustrate.

translation.en: They would come to me and like, "What are you working on with the booking platform?
translation.it: Venivano a dirmi: "Tu su cosa lavori, con la piattaforma di booking?

translation.en: I can't wait to get back on this side of the business
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di tornare a lavorare in questo settore,

translation.en: because the festival stuff is just becoming chaotic."
translation.it: le questioni del festival sono un casino".

translation.en: We just knew very little about what was happening on the festival side,
translation.it: Noi sapevamo pochissimo di quello che accadeva lì,

translation.en: except, you know, the persistent feeling of growing dread.
translation.it: a parte la sensazione costante di una paura crescente.

translation.en: Every single day, it got endlessly more tense.
translation.it: Ogni giorno, l'atmosfera era infinitamente più tesa.

translation.en: We would be at standstill sometimes for weeks
translation.it: A volte restavamo fermi per settimane,

translation.en: not being able to get that final sign off or move through on things
translation.it: senza ricevere l'ok per proseguire,

translation.en: because he was completely, you know, succumbed to the festival needs.
translation.it: perché lui era completamente preso dai bisogni del festival.

translation.en: Spending money at an outrageous cost and speed.
translation.it: Spendeva soldi all'impazzata.

translation.en: I wasn't sure if it was startup woes, just like "unorganization",
translation.it: Non sapevo se fosse per via della startup, della disorganizzazione,

translation.en: or if it was actually financial trouble, but sometimes payments would be late.
translation.it: o se ci fossero problemi finanziari, ma a volte i pagamenti non arrivavano.

translation.en: Friday afternoon,
translation.it: Ogni venerdì pomeriggio,

translation.en: our favorite topic is, "Did you get paid and was it for the right amount?"
translation.it: il nostro argomento preferito era: "Ti hanno pagato? Il giusto?"

translation.en: and Michael once was like, "Yeah, I got paid, but it was in a bag of cash."
translation.it: Una volta, Michael ha detto: "Sì, ma era una borsa piena di contanti".

translation.en: [Andy] I knew that cash flow was becoming an issue,
translation.it: Sapevo che il flusso di cassa stava diventando un problema,

translation.en: but Billy handled all the finances.
translation.it: ma era Billy che gestiva le finanze.

translation.en: At that point,
translation.it: A quel punto,

translation.en: Billy had said, "Listen, we're into this for 25 million bucks.
translation.it: mi aveva detto: "Ci siamo dentro per 25 milioni di dollari".

translation.en: I'm like, "Oh, my gosh, Billy, jeepers."
translation.it: Io ho pensato: "Accidenti, Billy".

translation.en: The word from people that knew Billy was that he was a magician fundraiser
translation.it: La gente che lo conosceva diceva che Billy era un fundraiser eccezionale

translation.en: and he just kept pulling money in, somehow.
translation.it: e che riusciva sempre a fare soldi.

translation.en: [Andy] Billy would get on a jet, he'd fly to New York and he'd come back
translation.it: Prendeva un jet, volava a New York, e al ritorno,

translation.en: and somehow have another three million bucks
translation.it: non si sa come, aveva altri tre milioni

translation.en: in his pocket to pull off the next level of needs.
translation.it: in tasca da spendere dove c'era bisogno.

translation.en: [Mick] Carola was one of the many investors.
translation.it: Carola era tra gli investitori principali.

translation.en: She was a big believer in Billy.
translation.it: Credeva molto in Billy.

translation.en: She was there from his earliest venture, Magnesis, and then Fyre.
translation.it: C'era sempre stata, prima con Magnises, poi con Fyre.

translation.en: She had always been around, always supporting this kid
translation.it: Lo aveva sempre sostenuto

translation.en: and always believing in his ability to become the next big entrepreneur.
translation.it: e aveva sempre creduto che un giorno sarebbe diventato un grande imprenditore.

translation.en: We can figure out how to make an extra three, four, five million dollars.
translation.it: Dobbiamo trovare un modo per fare altri quattro o cinque milioni.

translation.en: Whether it's higher-tier artist passes,
translation.it: Tipo, dei pass per incontrare gli artisti,

translation.en: food and alcohol passes, VIP party passes,
translation.it: dei pass per alcol e cibo, pass VIP per la festa,

translation.en: the Kendall Jenner yacht party for $10,000 a head for 100 people.
translation.it: o una festa sullo yacht di Kendall Jenner per 100 persone a $10.000 l'uno.

translation.en: Billy had a vision, you know, and he was definitely thinking
translation.it: Billy aveva un'idea in mente, e cercava sempre

translation.en: of every little twist that he could come up with to raise the money to make it happen.
translation.it: un modo per fare i soldi necessari per realizzarla.

translation.en: There's two things going for us: one, an audience who has cash,
translation.it: A nostro favore c'è il pubblico, che ha i soldi,

translation.en: and us, we have the celebrity, we have the island.
translation.it: e noi, che abbiamo le celebrità e l'isola.

translation.en: There's ways we can monetize both, we're gonna make that happen.
translation.it: Se facciamo fruttare le cose, possiamo realizzarlo.

translation.en: I overheard a conversation,
translation.it: Un giorno ho sentito dire:

translation.en: "Let's put up a cabaña for $50,000 and see if anyone buys it."
translation.it: "Mettiamo la capanna a $50.000 e vediamo se la compra qualcuno".

translation.en: And I remember thinking, "Do you have a cabaña to sell?
translation.it: Io ho pensato: "Ma ce l'avete una capanna?"

translation.en: Because I'm feeling concerned that you're not thinking about that
translation.it: Perché mi preoccupa che non ci pensiate

translation.en: before you are putting it live on the site for someone to buy."
translation.it: prima di metterla in vendita sul sito.

translation.en: [Marc] So, this website came out. It was, like, "fyrecay.com."
translation.it: Poi è uscito fuori questo sito, "fyrecay.com",

translation.en: And the site's sole purpose was to destroy this festival.
translation.it: il cui unico scopo era quello di distruggere il festival.

translation.en: It was getting fed direct information and photos
translation.it: C'erano informazioni dirette e foto

translation.en: of the site that was totally unfinished.
translation.it: della location che non era pronta.

translation.en: News that was happening by the day that only
translation.it: Erano raccontati fatti che accadevano in giornata

translation.en: pretty senior people in the festival knew what was happening.
translation.it: e che solo i responsabili del festival conoscevano.

translation.en: [Martin] It was almost like WikiLeaks.
translation.it: ECCO COSA TI HANNO VENDUTO... Sembrava WikiLeaks.

translation.en: We were having these confidential meetings and then things from that meeting
translation.it: Facevamo delle riunioni riservate, di cui alcune cose

translation.en: were actually getting out, word for word.
translation.it: venivano poi pubblicate, parola per parola.

translation.en: So we knew someone actually in the meeting had been wired up.
translation.it: Sapevamo che qualcuno si era fatto microfonare.

translation.en: So we were all called to the war room to have a meeting
translation.it: Così siamo stati tutti convocati

translation.en: and it was basically a witch hunt meeting.
translation.it: in quella che si è rivelata una caccia alle streghe.

translation.en: It was, "If you are the person
translation.it: Ci hanno detto: "Se qualcuno di voi

translation.en: or people that are sending this information to this website,
translation.it: sta dando queste informazioni a questo sito,

translation.en: we will pursue legal action,
translation.it: procederemo per vie legali,

translation.en: you will leave this island, you will not get paid
translation.it: dovrete lasciate l'isola, non verrete pagati

translation.en: and we'll come after you."
translation.it: e verremo a cercarvi".

translation.en: The guy that put together Fyrecay was extorting Billy.
translation.it: Il tizio che aveva ideato il sito stava ricattando Billy.

translation.en: Billy wanted him to take the website down.
translation.it: Billy voleva che lo chiudesse,

translation.en: He said he would only do it if the Fyre Festival
translation.it: ma lui disse che l'avrebbe fatto solo se il Fyre Festival

translation.en: started releasing actual photos of the campsites.
translation.it: avrebbe pubblicato le foto reali della zona.

translation.en: And I just kept saying to Billy,
translation.it: Io continuavo a dire a Billy:

translation.en: "We need to get the messaging out now that this is not a luxury music festival.
translation.it: "Dobbiamo far sapere alla gente che non è un festival musicale di lusso.

translation.en: People aren't staying on yachts, at least, most aren't,
translation.it: Che non alloggeranno sugli yacht, non tutti,

translation.en: many are not staying in villas
translation.it: né nelle ville.

translation.en: and if you can get that messaging out now, we will be able to manage expectations."
translation.it: Se lo diciamo adesso, potremo gestire le aspettative".

translation.en: [Mark] You know? Like here's the reality. Just do it
translation.it: "È così. Fallo e basta,

translation.en: and people will make their own decisions on it.
translation.it: poi la gente deciderà di conseguenza.

translation.en: But you have got to be honest.
translation.it: Ma devi essere sincero.

translation.en: Here's what it is. Here's the tents, you know?
translation.it: Le cose stanno così. Qui ci sono tende.

translation.en: People are going to find out sooner or later, so, like,
translation.it: Tanto la gente prima o poi lo scoprirà,

translation.en: why are you walking around...
translation.it: quindi perché girarci intorno

translation.en: trying to dodge the inevitable?
translation.it: e cercare di evitare l'inevitabile?"

translation.en: [Marc C.] We were gearing up. We were ready to go.
translation.it: Ci stavamo preparando. Eravamo pronti.

translation.en: We're, like, going to the gym, having this grand old time.
translation.it: Andavamo in palestra, ce la spassavamo.

translation.en: We would go on these jogs every morning to get ready for Fyre Festival.
translation.it: Facevamo jogging ogni mattina per prepararci per il Fyre Festival.

translation.en: Like, powering around town. "We're going on this great vacation.
translation.it: Ci caricavamo pensando: "Sarà una vacanza magnifica,

translation.en: We're going to have such a blast.
translation.it: ci divertiremo un mondo.

translation.en: We're going to meet all these people and have this...
translation.it: Conosceremo un sacco di gente e...

translation.en: just truly fantastic experience."
translation.it: ...sarà un'esperienza incredibile".

translation.en: I mean, it was so exciting.
translation.it: Insomma, era così eccitante.

translation.en: [Seth] On April 22nd, I get an email.
translation.it: Il 22 aprile, ricevo un'email.

translation.en: "I noticed you hadn't created your Fyreband account yet.
translation.it: "Abbiamo notato che non hai ancora creato un account Fyreband.

translation.en: It is your wallet for the weekend, so load it appropriately.
translation.it: È il tuo portafoglio per il weekend, meglio ricaricarlo.

translation.en: The majority of our guests have added $3,000 for the weekend.
translation.it: La maggior parte dei nostri ospiti hanno versato $3.000.

translation.en: But if you want to reserve tables or take part in the add-on experiences,
translation.it: Ma se vuoi prenotare tavoli o partecipare ad attività extra,

translation.en: you will want to put on much more."
translation.it: ti conviene versare di più".

translation.en: Billy wanted the engineers to set up payment through this RFID bracelet.
translation.it: Billy voleva impostare i pagamenti attraverso dei braccialetti RFID.

translation.en: [Mark] We all said that was insane based on the wireless communication issues.
translation.it: Noi gli abbiamo detto che era assurdo, vista la scarsa comunicazione wireless.

translation.en: I mean, this was never tested out.
translation.it: Insomma, non li avevamo mai provati.

translation.en: [Shiyyuan] The urgency wasn't, "Let's make this a cashless experience
translation.it: Il problema non erano i contanti da eliminare

translation.en: for our festival attendees."
translation.it: per i partecipanti al festival,

translation.en: It was, "We can't put on the Fyre Festival because we don't have any money."
translation.it: ma il fatto di non poter fare il festival perché non c'erano soldi.

translation.en: I received a call from a woman
translation.it: Mi chiamò una donna

translation.en: asking me, I would say, very aggressively
translation.it: chiedendomi, in maniera molto aggressiva,

translation.en: to put money on my wristband.
translation.it: di mettere soldi sul mio braccialetto.

translation.en: They wanted you to buy jet ski things, a private plane.
translation.it: Volevano venderti cose per le moto d'acqua, l'aereo privato...

translation.en: [Andy] It was a staggering amount of money. The first batch of kids had loaded...
translation.it: Erano cifre sconcertanti. I primi ragazzi avevano caricato...

translation.en: $800,000 on these wristbands.
translation.it: ...$800.000 su quei braccialetti.

translation.en: You know, you've spent all this money on a ticket,
translation.it: Avevamo speso quei soldi sul biglietto,

translation.en: and now the same amount of money on the wristband, it seemed...
translation.it: e ora versare la stessa cifra su un braccialetto era...

translation.en: sort of peculiar.
translation.it: ...peculiare.

translation.en: [Marc] So now we're down to probably ten days left to the festival at this point.
translation.it: Ormai mancavano dieci giorni al festival.

translation.en: They didn't have enough tents and 350 people would have nowhere to stay
translation.it: Non c'erano abbastanza tende e 350 persone non avrebbero avuto un posto dove stare.

translation.en: and by the way, houses that we sourced weren't getting paid.
translation.it: E non avevano nemmeno pagato le case che avevamo trovato.

translation.en: So this was now becoming clear that there wasn't any money.
translation.it: Era piuttosto chiaro che erano finiti i soldi.

translation.en: Because homeowners were like, "You sent me a wire...
translation.it: I proprietari delle case dicevano: "Mi hai fatto il versamento...

translation.en: five days ago and I haven't received any funds."
translation.it: ...cinque giorni fa, ma non ho ancora ricevuto nulla".

translation.en: I had an explicit phone call from one of the management team
translation.it: Uno del gruppo direttivo mi ha chiamato dicendomi

translation.en: to stop telling Carola about the housing situation,
translation.it: chiaramente di smetterla di parlare a Carola delle residenze

translation.en: because they were trying to get more money from her...
translation.it: perché volevano chiederle più soldi,

translation.en: and that my emails were alarming her...
translation.it: e che le mie email l'allarmavano,

translation.en: and they outright told me to be dishonest.
translation.it: quindi mi hanno esplicitamente detto di mentire.

translation.en: And you have to realize I got paid 30% of my fee, so they're hanging--
translation.it: E mi avevano dato solo il 30% del mio compenso,

translation.en: My fee's not due until the day of the event,
translation.it: dovevano pagarmi il giorno dell'evento,

translation.en: so they're hanging 70% of my fee over my head like a carrot.
translation.it: quindi mi tenevano il restante 70% sospeso davanti, come una carota.

translation.en: [Andy] Every day, something else would happen.
translation.it: Ogni giorno ne succedeva una.

translation.en: Every hour, something else would happen.
translation.it: Ogni ora c'era un nuovo problema.

translation.en: Every minute, there'd be another obstacle.
translation.it: Ogni minuto, un altro ostacolo.

translation.en: We had a $6 million contract
translation.it: Avevamo un contratto da sei milioni

translation.en: with Star Catering to handle all the food service
translation.it: con Star Catering per la ristorazione,

translation.en: and we only had $1 million allocated.
translation.it: ma avevamo stanziato solo un milione.

translation.en: And Billy fired them over the phone.
translation.it: E Billy li ha licenziati per telefono.

translation.en: And then he hung up the phone. I stood there and he said... "Can you salvage this?"
translation.it: Quando ha riattaccato, mi ha detto: "Puoi salvare la situazione?"

translation.en: And I said, "Oh, my gosh, I have two weeks to come up...
translation.it: E io: "Oddio, ho due settimane per trovare...

translation.en: with food service for 6,000 kids? This is going to be fascinating."
translation.it: ...del cibo per 6.000 ragazzi? Fantastico".

translation.en: Grant, who was on the call,
translation.it: Grant, al telefono,

translation.en: pulled out the proposal from Star and said,
translation.it: ha rifiutato la proposta della Star dicendo:

translation.en: "I told them I wanted sushi chefs coming in,"
translation.it: "Gli avevo detto che volevo chef di sushi

translation.en: and, "I needed to see Indian cuisine,"
translation.it: e cucina indiana".

translation.en: and I thought, "Gosh, Grant, you've missed the boat here."
translation.it: Io ho pensato: "Accidenti, Grant. Ti sei perso qualcosa".

translation.en: We are not spending $6 million, we can only spend $1 million
translation.it: Non spenderemo sei milioni, possiamo solo spenderne uno,

translation.en: and I'm eliminating all of that."
translation.it: quindi scordati tutta questa roba.

translation.en: At this point in time,
translation.it: A quel punto,

translation.en: there had been no progress pictures, no updated videos.
translation.it: non avevano più pubblicato foto o video nuovi.

translation.en: They were using the same footage and photographs
translation.it: Usavano gli stessi video e le stesse foto

translation.en: from that first promotional video
translation.it: del video promozionale

translation.en: in all of the subsequent promotional content.
translation.it: in tutti gli altri contenuti.

translation.en: The media and marketing companies in New York,
translation.it: Noi società di media e marketing a New York

translation.en: we didn't have any visibility into what was happening on the production side.
translation.it: non avevamo idea di cosa stesse accadendo nella produzione.

translation.en: We're building out this vision that was based around this kind of visual facade.
translation.it: Ci facevamo un'idea che si basava su questa specie di facciata visiva.

translation.en: [Mark C.] We noticed quite quickly that all of the original sketches of the rooms
translation.it: Ci siamo resi conto che i vecchi schizzi delle stanze

translation.en: that we had signed up for got taken off the page.
translation.it: che avevamo prenotato erano spariti dalla pagina.

translation.en: That was sort of when we started trying to dig a little bit more and see,
translation.it: É stato allora che abbiamo iniziato a scavare più a fondo e a chiedere

translation.en: "Oh, can you send us pictures of the accommodations?"
translation.it: di mandarci foto degli alloggi.

translation.en: You had people asking very legitimate questions on Instagram.
translation.it: Facevano domande legittime su Instagram.

translation.en: They were trying to book flights, trying to understand logistics.
translation.it: Volevano prenotare i voli, capire la logistica...

translation.en: [Mick] We just started getting bombarded with all these questions.
translation.it: Hanno iniziato a bombardarci di domande.

translation.en: Grant was trying to use our employees for customer service,
translation.it: Grant voleva usare noi nel servizio clienti,

translation.en: but that wasn't what we were hired to do.
translation.it: ma non eravamo stati assunti per quello.

translation.en: The only thing we could do was to just keep telling people,
translation.it: L'unica cosa che potevamo fare era ripetere alla gente:

translation.en: "Email concierge@fyre.com."
translation.it: "Scrivete un'email a concierge@fyre.com."

translation.en: And then we would get another request saying, "concierge@fyre.com didn't respond."
translation.it: Ma poi loro ci scrivevano: "concierge@fyre.com non ha risposto".

translation.en: The unanswered questions turned to people criticizing...
translation.it: Le domande senza risposta portavano alle critiche...

translation.en: [Mark C.] It was very annoying.
translation.it: Era davvero fastidioso.

translation.en: I was like, "This is terrible customer service.
translation.it: Pensavo: "Che servizio pessimo.

translation.en: They need to know better. They're throwing this luxury festival..."
translation.it: Dovrebbero essere più informati. Stanno organizzando un festival di lusso".

translation.en: [Mick] And then you'd have Grant reaching outand saying,
translation.it: Poi Grant ci ha scritto:

translation.en: "These comments are killing us. What do we do about all the people that are talking shit?"
translation.it: "Questi commenti ci uccidono. Che facciamo con quelli che ci criticano?"

translation.en: The decision was to screenshot all of the legitimate questions
translation.it: Così abbiamo deciso di screenshottare tutte le domande legittime

translation.en: and forward that over to the Fyre team
translation.it: e inoltrarle al team Fyre,

translation.en: and then delete all of the negative comments
translation.it: ed eliminare tutti i commenti negativi

translation.en: that were degrading the brand.
translation.it: che rovinavano la reputazione del marchio.

translation.en: I saw them actively deleting comments
translation.it: Li ho visti cancellare i commenti

translation.en: and then turning comments off entirely
translation.it: e poi disattivarli del tutto

translation.en: so that you wouldn't have 3,000 people saying,
translation.it: così da non avere 3.000 persone che scrivevano:

translation.en: "Hey, I don't have my flight information. Where do I need to go?"
translation.it: "Ehi, non ho le informazioni del volo. Dove devo andare?"

translation.en: So as me and Billy was riding back towards the site...
translation.it: Io e Billy stavamo tornando alla location,

translation.en: You know, he was like.... Kinda like panicky look, you know?
translation.it: e lui era nel panico, no? EX APPALTATORE FYRE

translation.en: So he's like,
translation.it: Mi fa:

translation.en: "What do you think? You think we can get this done?
translation.it: "Tu che pensi? Credi che possiamo farcela?"

translation.en: I said, "What do you mean?"
translation.it: Io dico: "In che senso?"

translation.en: "You think we can get everything done before Thursday?"
translation.it: "Pensi che sarà tutto pronto per giovedì?"

translation.en: So...
translation.it: Per cui...

translation.en: Me saying to myself right there, I say,
translation.it: Io penso tra me e me:

translation.en: "You want to lie to him or you just want to speak the truth?"
translation.it: "Gli mento o dico la verità?"

translation.en: 'Cause sometimes the truth can come pretty,
translation.it: Perché a volte la verità fa bene,

translation.en: and then sometimes the truth can just come ugly.
translation.it: ma altre volte è peggio dire la verità.

translation.en: So, I was like,
translation.it: Così gli dico:

translation.en: "Billy, being honest, I think we could do it.
translation.it: "Billy, sinceramente, credo che possiamo farcela.

translation.en: But we need some more time. We need to do some overtime
translation.it: Ma ci serve più tempo. Dobbiamo fare gli straordinari

translation.en: and we need to just push... We need to do more hours."
translation.it: e spingere... Dobbiamo lavorare di più".

translation.en: [Andy] Every day we met, every day, we would talk about,
translation.it: Ogni volta che ci vedevamo, dicevamo:

translation.en: "Okay, should we pull the plug or should we keep this thing going?"
translation.it: "Ok, stacchiamo la spina o andiamo avanti?"

translation.en: And every day, Billy would say,
translation.it: E Billy diceva sempre:

translation.en: "We can't pull the plug. We've got to keep this thing going."
