translation.it: Sono fradici!

translation.en: [Mick] The tents are soaked, mud is sliding on the carpets.
translation.it: Le tende erano zuppe, c'era fango sui tappeti.

translation.en: What was already this kind of very loosely put together festival,
translation.it: Quello che era già un festival arrangiato

translation.en: which was over-advertised,
translation.it: e troppo pubblicizzato

translation.en: has now devolved into something much worse.
translation.it: si era trasformato in qualcosa di molto peggio.

translation.en: [Marc] We didn't have enough drivers, we didn't have enough houses,
translation.it: Non avevamo abbastanza autisti, né abbastanza case,

translation.en: we didn't have enough beds, we didn't have enough site,
translation.it: o letti, o posto,

translation.en: we didn't have enough staff.
translation.it: o staff.

translation.en: It was just... We were overwhelmed.
translation.it: Era semplicemente... Eravamo sopraffatti.

translation.en: So I'm getting phone calls. I'm trying to charge my phone,
translation.it: Mentre caricavo il telefono mi chiamavano

translation.en: and the calls are to get me to the blue production house.
translation.it: per dirmi di andare nella casa di produzione blu.

translation.en: So I get there and it's mayhem. People are scrambling everywhere.
translation.it: Una volta lì, c'era il caos. La gente correva ovunque.

translation.en: They're still outside trying to build stuff.
translation.it: Stavano ancora lì a costruire.

translation.en: [Marc] Grant was like, "You got the paper bags?"
translation.it: Grant diceva: "Avete buste di carta?"

translation.en: Because he's like hyperventilating in the bedroom.
translation.it: Perché stava stava andando in iperventilazione.

translation.en: People are crying and it's all these emotions.
translation.it: La gente piangeva ed erano tutti provati.

translation.en: I was like, "Okay, get your shit done."
translation.it: Ho pensato: "Ok, sistema la faccenda".

translation.en: I'm literally getting now physically pulled
translation.it: Venivo letteralmente tirato

translation.en: in different directions by the assistants.
translation.it: da tutte le parti dagli assistenti.

translation.en: "Marc, this person arrived, that person arrived.
translation.it: "Marc, è arrivato questo, è arrivato quello.

translation.en: We need to find them houses."
translation.it: Troviamogli delle case".

translation.en: I thought something was wrong
translation.it: Ho pensato che qualcosa non andava

translation.en: after they held us on the beach for six hours.
translation.it: dopo che ci avevano trattenuti sulla spiaggia per sei ore,

translation.en: Kinda funneling tequila down our throats.
translation.it: versandoci tequila in gola.

translation.en: They started asking,
translation.it: Hanno iniziato a chiedere:

translation.en: "Where can I go? Where do we go?"
translation.it: "Dove posso andare? Dove andiamo?"

translation.en: "How are we getting to the campsite? Where is the campsite? Where's my luggage?"
translation.it: "Come arriviamo al campeggio? Dov'è? Dove sono le mie valigie?"

translation.en: And I was like,
translation.it: Io pensavo:

translation.en: "What do I tell them?"
translation.it: "Che gli dico?"

translation.en: You know, Billy would be in the room and he'd be kind of the CEO, calling the shots.
translation.it: Billy era nella stanza ed era il CEO che prendeva le decisioni.

translation.en: Every now and then, he would walk out, go get on his four-wheeler,
translation.it: Ogni tanto usciva, prendeva il quad

translation.en: and just ride really fast in, like, one direction.
translation.it: e iniziava a guidare in una direzione.

translation.en: Just take off.
translation.it: Spariva.

translation.en: And then he would come right back and walk back in without, you know,
translation.it: Poi tornava e rientrava

translation.en: a lot to talk about, but you could see he just had like bottled up energy.
translation.it: senza parlare granché, ma si vedeva che aveva energia repressa.

translation.en: It's time to let people in and kind of see how it unfolds.
translation.it: Era ora di far entrare quelle persone e vedere cosa succedeva.

translation.en: [Marc C.] There was no one from Fyre Festival on the bus.
translation.it: Sul bus non c'era nessuno del Fyre Festival.

translation.en: The bus driver just knew where to go, and he's telling us,
translation.it: L'autista sapeva dove andare, e ci diceva:

translation.en: "Oh, yeah, they didn't start construction on any of this until maybe a month ago."
translation.it: "Oh, hanno iniziato a costruire solo un mese fa.

translation.en: Or, "Oh, yeah, you're really in for something.
translation.it: Ne vedrete delle belle.

translation.en: Just wait until you see what you're getting yourselves into."
translation.it: Aspettate di vedere in cosa vi state cacciando".

translation.en: Which is a very concerning thing to hear when you're on a bus
translation.it: Ed era molto preoccupante sentire cose del genere

translation.en: to you have no idea where
translation.it: quando non avevi idea di dove fossi,

translation.en: after taking a plane to God knows what island
translation.it: dopo aver preso un aereo per Dio solo sa quale isola,

translation.en: with who knows what people.
translation.it: con chissà quali persone.

translation.en: Turn around!
translation.it: Torna indietro!

translation.en: Turn this bus right around!
translation.it: Fai inversione!

translation.en: We see this sea of white little tents.
translation.it: Abbiamo visto un mare di tende bianche.

translation.en: [Seth] There was a disbelief on the bus.
translation.it: Nessuno ci poteva credere.

translation.en: A lot of people thought, "Maybe we're passing through this area.
translation.it: Molti pensavano che forse era un'area di passaggio,

translation.en: Our villas are just on the other side."
translation.it: che le ville fossero dall'altra parte.

translation.en: And it was the bus driver who said, "Oh, no. That's where you're staying."
translation.it: Ma l'autista ci ha detto: "Oh, no. È qui che starete".

translation.en: It was like, "Oh, my God!"
translation.it: Abbiamo pensato: "Oh, mio Dio!"

translation.en: -[woman] Look at the beds! -[man] Oh, Jesus!
translation.it: - Guarda i letti! - Oh, Cristo!

translation.en: This festival is never happening again, I hope they know that.
translation.it: Questo festival non si ripeterà più, spero che lo sappiano.

translation.en: [Seth] They kinda drive us around the little lagoon
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto il giro della laguna

translation.en: and we get to that blue house that I guess was their headquarters,
translation.it: e siamo arrivati alla casa blu, che credo fosse il quartier generale,

translation.en: and there was just a line of hundreds of people.
translation.it: e c'erano centinaia di persone in fila.

translation.en: [woman] We have literally been standing here for, like, an hour.
translation.it: Siamo qui da tipo un'ora.

translation.en: [Seth] We didn't know what we were standing in line for, but we kept standing there,
translation.it: Non sapevamo perché stessimo in fila, ma continuavamo a stare lì,

translation.en: and some people just had bottles of liquor.
translation.it: e alcuni bevevano liquore.

translation.en: Billy came up to me and told me to just blast the music.
translation.it: Billy è venuto e mi ha detto di far partire la musica.

translation.en: As loud as I possibly could.
translation.it: Di alzare il volume al massimo.

translation.en: That's one of the most annoying parts. You could just hear this pulsating noise.
translation.it: Quello è stato uno dei momenti peggiori. Sentivamo solo un rumore pulsante.

translation.en: [Luca] And, you know, every five minutes it would be...
translation.it: E ogni cinque minuti, veniva

translation.en: Like, one of the hostesses or one of the staff that would come,
translation.it: una delle hostess o qualcuno dello staff a dirmi:

translation.en: "Please, we cannot hear anything as we're trying to check in these people."
translation.it: "Ti prego, non sentiamo e stiamo cercando di registrare queste persone".

translation.en: And so we would lower the music.
translation.it: Così abbassavo il volume.

translation.en: After five minutes, Billy would come back.
translation.it: Ma dopo cinque minuti, veniva Billy.

translation.en: "Raise the music."
translation.it: "Alza il volume".

translation.en: Everyone was, like, arguing, you know?
translation.it: Stavano tutti discutendo.

translation.en: Everyone was making noise or like, "Where I'm gonna stay?
translation.it: Urlavano e chiedevano: "Dove devo andare?

translation.en: What am I gonna do? What am I gonna eat?"
translation.it: Che faccio? Cosa c'è da mangiare?"

translation.en: The attendees were looking towards anything, anyone for direction.
translation.it: I partecipanti cercavano aiuto ovunque.

translation.en: Guys, stay here.
translation.it: Ragazzi, state qui.

translation.en: [Seth] Billy McFarland stood up on a table.
translation.it: Billy McFarland era in piedi su un tavolo.

translation.en: So I just kind of walked up and I said, "Where do you go if you have a villa?"
translation.it: Mi sono avvicinato e ho detto: "Dove si va per le ville?"

translation.en: And he said, "Everybody that has a villa, just go grab a tent."
translation.it: E lui: "Chi ha una villa, prenda una tenda".

translation.en: And so this whole mass of people...
translation.it: La gente si è spostata in massa.

translation.en: I was like, "It's a free-for-all."
translation.it: Era un tutti contro tutti.

translation.en: [Justin] Everybody started sprinting, running to their tents, grabbing bags.
translation.it: Tutti hanno iniziato a correre verso le tende, prendendo le borse.

translation.en: [Mark] We heard this voice, we heard this rush, then we heard the screaming.
translation.it: Abbiamo sentito una voce, poi un trambusto e le urla.

translation.en: We walked out and there was just this mass of people going to tents.
translation.it: Siamo usciti e c'era questa massa di gente che andava verso le tende.

translation.en: [CC] It's an absolute circus. I don't know what's going on.
translation.it: È un circo. Non so cosa stia succedendo.

translation.en: I'm not getting off this ship until I know what's going on there.
translation.it: Io non scendo dalla barca finché non capisco che succede.

translation.en: [woman] It's 8:36 and people are now just getting their luggage.
translation.it: Sono le 20:36 e la gente sta prendendo le valigie.

translation.en: These are the lockers that are just being set up.
translation.it: Questi sono gli armadietti che stanno montando.

translation.en: They're taking off the plastic that are supposed to hold our valuables.
translation.it: Stanno togliendo la plastica che dovrebbe contenere le nostre cose di valore.

translation.en: [Justin] There was no one who planned out luggage tags.
translation.it: Nessuno aveva pensato a etichettare i bagagli.

translation.en: They brought out the luggage in two big containers.
translation.it: Li hanno portati in due grossi contenitori,

translation.en: Like truck containers. Eighteen-wheeler containers.
translation.it: tipo dei camion a 18 ruote,

translation.en: They just said, "Everyone, grab your bag." And it was just a frenzy.
translation.it: e hanno detto: "Prendete i bagagli". C'è stato il delirio.

translation.en: [Marc C.] Everyone was just looking for, you know,
translation.it: Tutti cercavano

translation.en: their black bag amongst a sea of black bags.
translation.it: la propria valigia nera in un mare di valigie nere.

translation.en: And if they had to climb over you and stomp over you to get their piece of luggage, so be it.
translation.it: E se dovevano passarti sopra per prendere la loro valigia, lo facevano.

translation.en: This is an absolute disaster.
translation.it: È un disastro totale.

translation.en: Where do you-- Yo!
translation.it: Dove... Yo!

translation.en: We do not want to be on the perimeter, I promise you.
translation.it: Non ci stiamo sul perimetro, te lo assicuro.

translation.en: [Justin] We didn't want neighbors.
translation.it: Non volevamo avere vicini.

translation.en: Our strategy from there was to kind of ransack all the tents around us.
translation.it: Abbiamo iniziato a saccheggiare tutte le tende intorno a noi.

translation.en: Just started poking holes and flipping mattresses.
translation.it: Facevamo dei buchi e giravamo i materassi.

translation.en: My buddy pissed on a few of the beds.
translation.it: Il mio amico ha pisciato su qualche letto.

translation.en: [Columbo] Shit got crazy.
translation.it: C'era un casino.

translation.en: People was just walking with mattresses on top of their head.
translation.it: C'era gente che camminava con i materassi in testa,

translation.en: Walking from this one around to that one.
translation.it: da una tenda all'altra.

translation.en: [Marc C.] It became this looting mentality.
translation.it: Tutti saccheggiavano qualcosa.

translation.en: One woman had a whole pallet of toilet paper.
translation.it: Una donna aveva un bancale intero di carta igienica.

translation.en: Somebody else had this whole giant box of pillows
translation.it: Un'altra aveva una scatola enorme di cuscini

translation.en: that she was lugging back to her tent.
translation.it: che si stava portando nella tenda.

translation.en: It became very barbaric, in a sense.
translation.it: È diventato tutto molto barbaro, in un certo senso.

translation.en: [Mark] Driving around, it was the most eerie feeling in the world.
translation.it: Tutto intorno, c'era l'atmosfera più inquietante del mondo.

translation.en: There was no lights.
translation.it: Non c'erano luci.

translation.en: [Mick] It looked like a horror scene.
translation.it: Sembrava una scena dell'orrore.

translation.en: People were scattered throughout that area and spent one night.
translation.it: C'era gente sparsa qua e là e ha passato la notte così.

translation.en: My guess is most of them never went to sleep.
translation.it: Credo che molti di loro non abbiano dormito affatto.

translation.en: [Mark C.] Some woman came in in a panic at one point in the dead of night.
translation.it: Una donna è entrata nel panico in piena notte.

translation.en: She couldn't find her friend.
translation.it: Non trovava la sua amica.

translation.en: She was lost, she seemed like she was drunk. I mean...
translation.it: Si era persa, sembrava ubriaca. Ma...

translation.en: But there's nothing you can do to help a person like that.
translation.it: ...cosa potevo fare per aiutarla?

translation.en: You know, I don't know where I am either.
translation.it: Neanch'io sapevo dove mi trovassi.

translation.en: And there was a definite turning point, I would say,
translation.it: Tutto è cambiato decisamente

translation.en: when the sun went down,
translation.it: quando il sole è tramontato

translation.en: when the camaraderie was over.
translation.it: e lo spirito di squadra è sparito.

translation.en: [Mark] All I know is that, by the end of the night,
translation.it: Di sicuro, a fine serata,

translation.en: all of the tents were full.
translation.it: tutte le tende erano occupate.

translation.en: And this is with one-third of the guests we were supposed to have.
translation.it: Ed erano solo un terzo degli ospiti.

translation.en: [Mick] I remember just leaving this place and looking at this image of the campground
translation.it: Ricordo di essermene andato guardando quel campeggio

translation.en: for the first time feeling what an epic failure really is.
translation.it: e provando per la prima volta una sensazione di completo fallimento.

translation.en: [Seth] So, as I was tweeting about the event,
translation.it: IL FYRE FEST È UN DISASTRO. CAOS E NESSUNA ORGANIZZAZIONE. Mentre twittavo sull'evento,

translation.en: just to be like, "This is what's going on."
translation.it: per mostrare cosa stava succedendo,

translation.en: I mean, "Here's the lockers, here's the concierge stand.
translation.it: gli armadietti, la portineria

translation.en: This is what Fyre Festival is."
translation.it: e tutto il Fyre Festival,

translation.en: The tweets just started going viral.
translation.it: i tweet sono diventati virali.

translation.en: It was just kind of the perfect thing to consume in real-time.
translation.it: Era la cosa perfetta da consumare in tempo reale. È IL CAOS, LE TENDE SONO SOTTOSOPRA

translation.en: Then I saw the Twitter post.
translation.it: POCHISSIMO CIBO E ACQUA Poi ho visto quel post su Twitter.

translation.en: The cheese sandwich.
translation.it: Il panino al formaggio.

translation.en: That was when I knew this was done.
translation.it: Lì ho capito che era finita.

translation.en: I remember The New York Times came out with an article
translation.it: RETWEET MI PIACE Il New York Times ha pubblicato un articolo

translation.en: that talked about this entire Fyre Festival.
translation.it: sul Fyre Festival.

translation.en: [Mick] They talked about it very matter-of-fact, from an operational perspective.
translation.it: Ne parlavano in maniera concreta, dal punto di vista operativo.

translation.en: What they didn't talk about, which I think was something that was missed,
translation.it: TWEET NELL'ULTIMA ORA Quello che però, secondo me, mancava,

translation.en: was a couple of powerful models posting an orange tile
translation.it: era sottolineare il fatto che il post di qualche modella famosa

translation.en: is what essentially built this entire festival,
translation.it: aveva fatto nascere l'intero festival,

translation.en: and then one kid with probably 400 followers
translation.it: ma quello di un ragazzo con circa 400 follower

translation.en: posted a picture of cheese on toast
translation.it: su un panino al formaggio

translation.en: that trended and essentially ripped down the festival.
translation.it: lo aveva essenzialmente distrutto.

translation.en: All I know is that people were stoked to watch this thing go down.
translation.it: So solo che la gente era entusiasta di vedere un tale fallimento.

translation.en: [Gabrielle] There definitely was kind of like
translation.it: Sui social media,

translation.en: almost a gleeful response on social media
translation.it: la gente che non era presente

translation.en: from people that weren't there.
translation.it: gioiva di quanto accaduto.

translation.en: The way that it seemed like it happened is funny, you know?
translation.it: Ma lo facevano in maniera simpatica.

translation.en: A Lord of the Flies situation with, you know, Instagram's top influencers.
translation.it: Come il post de Il signore delle mosche con i più grandi influencer di Instagram.

translation.en: [Mick] Grant was still calling orders and asking us to do things.
translation.it: Grant continuava a dare ordini e a dirci cosa fare.

translation.en: I said, "No, Grant, we're not posting any more promises.
translation.it: Gli ho detto: "No, Grant, non posteremo altre promesse.

translation.en: We're not trying to propel this vision any further."
translation.it: Basta portare avanti questa idea.

translation.en: You know, "This thing is dead."
translation.it: È finita".

translation.en: Then I think, like, three minutes later, I get a text from Grant
translation.it: Poi, tre minuti dopo, ricevo un messaggio da Grant

translation.en: introducing me to their new social media team.
translation.it: in cui mi presenta il nuovo team di social media.

translation.en: "Can you please send him over the credentials?"
translation.it: "Puoi mandargli le credenziali?"

translation.en: I just remember calling Ja - he wasn't even there yet -
translation.it: Ricordo che ho chiamato Ja, non era nemmeno arrivato,

translation.en: and saying, like, "There's, like, no way this is happening.
translation.it: e gli ho detto: "Non esiste.

translation.en: I'm sending out the email. I really don't care at this point."
translation.it: Io invio l'email. A questo punto non m'importa".

translation.en: And then I told Billy I cancelled the acts
translation.it: Poi ho detto a Billy che avevo cancellato i concerti

translation.en: and at that point, he knew everything had fallen apart already.
translation.it: e a quel punto ha capito che era tutto andato in pezzi.

translation.en: And he was pacing back and forth out on the terrace.
translation.it: Faceva avanti e indietro in terrazzo.

translation.en: I could see that there were tears in his eyes,
translation.it: Aveva le lacrime agli occhi,

translation.en: but that was the first time that any of us had seen that.
translation.it: ed era la prima volta che lo vedevamo così.

translation.en: Through thick and thin,
translation.it: Nel bene e nel male,

translation.en: he stayed so positive and it wasn't until that day...
translation.it: era sempre rimasto positivo, fino a quel giorno,

translation.en: that things started to crumble, that he really started to get it.
translation.it: in cui tutto ha iniziato a sgretolarsi e se n'è davvero reso conto.

translation.en: [Mick] I mean, he went from, two days before,
translation.it: Insomma, in due giorni è passato

translation.en: thinking he was the entrepreneur of our decade
translation.it: dal credersi l'imprenditore del decennio

translation.en: to essentially being a massive viral disgrace and joke.
translation.it: al sentirsi una completa nullità.

translation.en: [Marc] I go into the production house, and, like, Grant's crying
translation.it: Sono entrato nella casa di produzione. Grant piangeva

translation.en: and Carola just looks like she's been like hit by a truck.
translation.it: e a Carola sembrava che fosse passato sopra un camion.

translation.en: Grant stayed and he was talking about drafting up their official response
translation.it: Grant parlava di scrivere una dichiarazione ufficiale

translation.en: to what had happened, and it was like, "Due to circumstances out of our control,"
translation.it: del tipo: "A causa di circostanze al di fuori del nostro controllo..."

translation.en: and I remember Jorge looks at him and he's like, "Do not lie again.
translation.it: Jorge l'ha guardato e gli ha detto: "Non mentire di nuovo.

translation.en: This is your chance to tell the truth.
translation.it: È la tua occasione per dire la verità.

translation.en: "Don't say 'out of our control.' This was perfectly in our control."
translation.it: Non c'era nulla al di fuori del nostro controllo".

translation.en: [James] Major update.
translation.it: Avviso importante.

translation.en: Fyre Festival is officially cancelled.
translation.it: Il Fyre Festival è ufficialmente annullato.

translation.en: -Just got the news, guys. -[woman] Officially?
translation.it: - L'ho appena saputo. - È ufficiale?

translation.en: -[man] Is it really? -It's what Mick said.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Così ha detto Mick.

translation.en: Apparently, there's no food on the island. They're not letting people in.
translation.it: Pare non ci sia cibo sull'isola. Non fanno entrare nessuno.

translation.en: [Gabrielle] People who just landed here have to go back to Miami.
translation.it: Chi è appena atterrato deve tornare a Miami.

translation.en: They were just trying to get out at that point.
translation.it: A quel punto volevano solo andarsene.

translation.en: Part of the problem was that there weren't planes to take them out
translation.it: Il problema era che non c'erano aerei

translation.en: and the airport was totally overwhelmed with all these people
translation.it: e l'aeroporto era stracolmo di tutta questa gente.

translation.en: and they eventually locked them in
translation.it: Alla fine li hanno chiusi dentro

translation.en: and kept them overnight without any food or water.♪
translation.it: e hanno passato la notte lì, senza cibo né acqua.

translation.en: Okay. How long until water comes?
translation.it: Ok. Tra quanto ci portano l'acqua?

translation.en: And food.
translation.it: E il cibo.

translation.en: [man] When do we get our money back?
translation.it: Riavremo i nostri soldi?

translation.en: It was just this sort of real-time saga that started at six o'clock in the afternoon.
translation.it: È stata una sorta di saga in tempo reale iniziata alle sei del pomeriggio.

translation.en: And in the morning, the media started picking it up.
translation.it: E, la mattina, i media hanno iniziato a riportare tutto.

translation.en: [reporter 1] This morning, the organizers of the failed Fyre Festival
translation.it: Questa mattina, gli organizzatori del mal riuscito Fyre Festival

translation.en: are feeling the heat.
translation.it: sentono le critiche.

translation.en: We took a big jump here, a big risk,
translation.it: Ci siamo assunti un bel rischio qui,

translation.en: and V1 has failed.
translation.it: e la prima edizione è fallita.

translation.en: People were making fun of it, making fun of us.
translation.it: La gente ci rideva sopra, ci prendeva in giro.

translation.en: [Conan] Do you feel bad for the people that did spend money and go to this--
translation.it: Ti dispiace per chi ha speso quei soldi ed è andato...

translation.en: If you had thousands of dollars to go on a trip to see Blink-182...
translation.it: Se spendi migliaia di dollari per andare a vedere i Blink-182...

translation.en: that's on you. That is Darwinism at its finest.
translation.it: ...è colpa tua. Quello è darwinismo allo stato puro.

translation.en: [Luca] At that point, all of their promises started to collapse,
translation.it: A quel punto, tutte le promesse fatte non reggevano più,

translation.en: so the car rental companies came and took the keys,
translation.it: per cui le società di autonoleggio si sono riprese le chiavi,

translation.en: the house owners came and demanded that their properties were returned.
translation.it: i proprietari delle case volevano indietro le loro proprietà.

translation.en: [Andy] One of my head construction guys came to me and said, "Andy,
translation.it: Uno dei responsabili edili è venuto a dirmi: "Andy,

translation.en: I need $26,000 in cash,
translation.it: mi dovete $26.000 in contanti,

translation.en: and I want it right now."
translation.it: e li voglio subito".

translation.en: He was a big guy and he followed me.
translation.it: Era un omaccione, e ha iniziato a seguirmi.

translation.en: And then I went back to the tent and he followed me.
translation.it: Sono andato in tenda e continuava a seguirmi.

translation.en: I had the head of the Bahamian Tourism Board,
translation.it: C'erano il capo dell'Ente Turistico delle Bahamas,

translation.en: the Minister of Finance
translation.it: il Ministro delle Finanze

translation.en: and the head of the University of the Bahamas

I unfortunately experienced it.

translation.it: Era totalmente fuori dalla sua portata.

translation.en: unfortunately for himself, a compulsive liar.
translation.it: Purtroppo per lui, è un mitomane.

translation.en: And someone that at the end, you know, should be held accountable.
translation.it: E prima o poi deve rispondere di quello che ha fatto.

translation.en: [MDavid] He has a massive debt,
translation.it: È indebitato fino al collo,

translation.en: not just to the people who invested or to the concert-goers.
translation.it: non solo con gli investitori o con i partecipanti.

translation.en: I think he has a larger debt to the employees
translation.it: Ha un debito più grande con gli impiegati

translation.en: that were reporting and working with him.
translation.it: che lavoravano con lui.

translation.en: The only way, in my opinion, a guy like this learns his lesson
translation.it: Un uomo così può imparare la lezione

translation.en: is actually going to jail.
translation.it: solo andando in prigione.

translation.en: [Calvin] I don't think that we've heard the last of Billy McFarland.
translation.it: Non credo che non sentiremo più parlare di Billy McFarland.

translation.en: I mean, if there's anything that guy is good at,
translation.it: Se c'è qualcosa in cui è bravo,

translation.en: it's separating consumers from their cash.
translation.it: è prendere soldi dai consumatori.

translation.en: And if there's anything that this country
translation.it: E non so se c'è qualcosa che Puesto paese

translation.en: celebrates more than that, I don't know.
translation.it: celebri più di questo.

translation.en: [Marc] Billy has a presence where, you know, there's something behind the smile.
translation.it: Billy nasconde sempre qualcosa dietro a quel sorriso.

translation.en: I wouldn't be surprised if ten years down the line,
translation.it: Non mi sorprenderebbe se fra dieci anni

translation.en: we're hearing about Billy McFarland starting some kind of other venture that's...
translation.it: venissimo a sapere di qualche altra sua iniziativa...

translation.en: you know, imaginative and, uh,
translation.it: ...fantasiosa e...

translation.en: and gets some serious momentum
translation.it: ...che partirà con un grande slancio,

translation.en: and, you know, this all happens in some form again.
translation.it: e magari si ripeterà tutto.

translation.en: It's Billy!
translation.it: È Billy!

translation.en: What's up, Billy?
translation.it: Come va, Billy?

translation.en: I'm in front of the cameraman. I'm talking--
translation.it: Sono davanti alla telecamera. Sto...

translation.en: I'm good.
translation.it: Sto bene.

translation.en: Yeah. I'm putting in some good words.
translation.it: Sto mettendo una buona parola.

translation.en: You want me to say anything on the camera for you?
translation.it: Vuoi che dica qualcosa per te?

translation.en: All right.
translation.it: Va bene.

translation.en: All right. Action!
translation.it: Ok. Azione!
